channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
Okay,the part I need help on is how to add stuff to my server. I've been wanting to know how to add stuff onto my server. All the other times I had my server I never edited it but I want to edit it now, cause I've seen other people post stuff on moparscape serverstatus that says: something on the server is in Construction. When I go to other server's at the top of the screen it says: Castle Wars in Construction. I want other people to be excited to play my server. The server I have now is just a plain server, I haven't added nothing to the server. But when I try to add things it never be on the screen or in my server. I can never change the name of screen it says: server created by: Caden but it always says the person that created the source. When I want to add something to my server it never says it on the screen. So when like other people log on my server they can see the updates that I did to the server. But the problem is that I really want to add stuff to my server like Castle Wars and God wars to get god sword's. If anybody could help me do that I would really appreciate it if they do. but can some people post how to add thing's to my server.
Here's Another Thing I Want To Ask:
Can someone tell me how to stop me from lagging out of my own server cause:
When I log on my server, "I can't move", "I can't stay logged in", I only stay logged in for like 1 minute then it says: "Please Wait", "Waiting To Reestablish". Why is this happening to me Do I need a new computer or something?
Please Reply.
Thanks, Colgi

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @T-R-A-V-I-S T-R-A-V-I-S
item.description:
@T-R-A-V-I-S wrote:

lol dude this is the simpilist thing

go to client.java
ctrl+f
search for
makeGlobalObject

add what you want find item ids at runelocus.com

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Colgi Colgi
item.description:
@Colgi wrote:

Okay,the part I need help on is how to add stuff to my server. I’ve been wanting to know how to add stuff onto my server. All the other times I had my server I never edited it but I want to edit it now, cause I’ve seen other people post stuff on moparscape serverstatus that says: something on the server is in Construction. When I go to other server’s at the top of the screen it says: Castle Wars in Construction. I want other people to be excited to play my server. The server I have now is just a plain server, I haven’t added nothing to the server. But when I try to add things it never be on the screen or in my server. I can never change the name of screen it says: server created by: Caden but it always says the person that created the source. When I want to add something to my server it never says it on the screen. So when like other people log on my server they can see the updates that I did to the server. But the problem is that I really want to add stuff to my server like Castle Wars and God wars to get god sword’s. If anybody could help me do that I would really appreciate it if they do. but can some people post how to add thing’s to my server.

                                      Here's Another Thing I Want To Ask:

Can someone tell me how to stop me from lagging out of my own server cause:

When I log on my server, “I can’t move”, “I can’t stay logged in”, I only stay logged in for like 1 minute then it says: “Please Wait”, “Waiting To Reestablish”. Why is this happening to me Do I need a new computer or something?

                                                Please Reply.

                                           Thanks, Colgi

Read full topic
